channel.title: Other | Yauaa - Yet Another UserAgent Analyzer

item.title: Blogpost
item.description: A bit more background about this useragent parser can be found in this blog which I wrote about it: https://techlab.bol.com/making-sense-user-agent-string/

item.title: Related projects
item.description: .NET port Stefano Balzarotti is putting a lot of effort into porting Yauaa to run in .NET standard. You can track his efforts here on GitHub: Yauaa .NET standard and download his releases via Nuget.
